summary: This is an email chain from September 9, 2021, discussing the preparation of an FBI 302 interview report. The correspondence involves an Assistant United States Attorney and other parties coordinating to share notes and attachments, including a document referred to as 'Epstein Blackbook OCR.pdf' and a specific page from it.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the initial email requesting notes from meetings the previous week, working at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Email Coordination for 302 Preparation
events.description: Email exchange regarding the preparation of an FBI 302 interview report, involving the sharing of notes and specific document attachments from a prior meeting.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The email discusses the preparation of an FBI 302 report following meetings held the prior week.
A specific attachment, 'Epstein Blackbook OCR.pdf', is referenced, with a note that only page 19 of that PDF was shown to an interviewee.
The correspondence highlights coordination between legal personnel to finalize and share investigative documentation.
